DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Manipulative Treatment Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Carpal Tunnel Syndrome ( CTS ) common compressive neuropathy upper limb . It considerably impair patient 's quality life generate important social consequence due lose productivity cost treatment . Both surgical conservative treatment utilized CTS management . Manipulative treatment conservative , non-drug cheap management option propose , , treatment guideline review recommend due lack evidence ass efficacy . Hypothesis : Manipulative treatment relieve patient discomfort dysfunction utilized cheap conservative management CTS . Study design : Two-groups randomized single-blind interventional study . Methods : Sixty-six patient report CTS symptom confirm clinical exam nerve conduction study include . Participants randomize two arm , one receive manipulative treatment one receiving simulate manipulative treatment ( 1/week 4 week ) . The main outcome measure DASH questionnaire , Boston Carpal Tunnel Syndrome Questionnaire , patient estimate Visual Analog Scale pain EuroQol-5D scale . All outcome measure administrate participant first manipulation , last session ( 4 week ) 12 week baseline measure .
